ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] New messages
ygData.msgSnippet: i m lucky to get 2 on dragons and planes, but that just brings us back to another point.  there really should be some type of skill for bards in expansion to
ygData.messageBody:
i'm lucky to get 2 on dragons and planes, but that just brings us back to
another point. there really should be some type of skill for bards in
expansion to relieve some of our twisting woes don't you think? doubtful i
know but after 110+ days played as a bard, i simply can not stand twisting
anymore =)

Shada

> No you're not missing anything. For most people 3 songs is
> all they can
> reliably medly. I medly four all the time (3 for dragons/planes).
> Basically if you've got a good connection and a reasonably
> speedy system 4
> songs is no problem in most situations (also have to have
> good reflexes ;)
>
> Sing on ;) 4 songs is a POWERFUL combo if you can get it going.
